sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect,useState} from 'react'; import API from '../api'; export default function RosterPreview({classId}){ const [members,setMembers]=useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ if(!classId) return; API.get(`/classes/${classId}/roster`).then(r=>setMembers(r.data.slice(0,5))).catch(()=>setMembers([])); },[classId]); if(!members.length) return
No members
; return (
{members.map(m=> (
{m.name}
{m.role}
))}
); }
